paragraph 1: The carrying amounts and fair values of Teradyne’s financial instruments at December 31, 2019 and 2018 were as follows:
paragraph 2: (1) The carrying value represents the bifurcated debt component only, while the fair value is based on quoted market prices for the convertible note which includes the equity conversion features.
paragraph 3: The fair values of accounts receivable, net and accounts payable approximate the carrying amount due to the short term nature of these instruments.
